title: X-Blades.PROPER-ViTALiTY
description:
X-Blades is an upcoming action-adventure game for the PlayStation 3, Xbox 360 and Microsoft Windows.[1] The player assumes the role of Ayumi, a pistol-blade user. The game was developed by Gaijin Entertainment and will be published by SouthPeak Interactive and TopWare Interactive. It was already released in December, 2007[2] by 1C Company only in the Russian language for Microsoft Windows, under the title Oniblade.



System Requirements 

Minimum 

* Windows XP with Service Pack 2
* Pentium 4 1.5GHz
* 256 MB RAM
* Graphics Card: ATI Radeon 9600 128MB or Nvidia Geforce 6600 128MB
* DirectX Compatible Sound Card
* 5 GB Hard Drive Space

Recommended 

* Windows XP with Service Pack 2/Windows Vista
* P4 3GHz
* 1GB RAM
* Graphics Card: Radeon X1800 256MB or Nvidia Geforce 7600 256MB
* 5 GB Hard Drive Space


/////////////////////////////////////////

The  Postmortem release leaves the launcher.exe uncracked which  will  still  ask  for a serial. This results in no accessibility  to  the graphic and sound settings for the user to change. Enjoy a properly cracked game thats fully functional !
